member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.GetReport(System.String)
member.summary: Returns information on a report identified by given id
member.returns: Report Information, an instance of Report

member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.UpdateReport(System.Collections.Generic.List{UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.Report})
member.param: Updated information on one or more reports

member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.GenerateReport(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a report file using the template specified by the report identified with id
member.param: Identifier of the report for which report file needs to be generated
